input.sentences: we go to an island for the first time
we get to see this old housse .
then we go to the other place .
then we go the villages to see what is there .
finally we get a cup of coffee .
output.sentences: I once visited a remote village in South America.
Many of the homes were made of mud brick/
The homes were gathered close together with dirt paths joining them.
The village plaza was packed dirt.
While the village did not seem to have much, the villagers gladly shared a cup of coffee with me.
